DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to describe the prediagnostic symptoms and the events along the pathway to diagnosis of women with ovarian cancer, referred for first-line chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Pathway to Diagnosis of Ovarian Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histological diagnosis of ovarian cancer Indication for chemotherapy Age > 18 years Signed informed consent Previous chemotherapy Unable or unwilling to participate in interview
